title: Theirs is tomorrow
creator_credit: Herschells Films and Roy A. Driver
brief_description: A survey of the educational facilities provided by the Education Department in the State of Victoria. The film shows typical activities of students attending Primary, Secondary and Technical schools and at the Teachers Training College.
